# Pipes of Haunting
## Overview
**Aura** faint necromancy; **CL** 4th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 6,000 gp

**Weight** 3 lbs.

**Description**

This magic item appears to be a small set of pan pipes. When played by a person who succeeds on a DC 15 [[Perform (Skill)|Perform]] (wind instruments) check, the pipes create an eerie, spellbinding tune. Those within 30 feet who hear the tune must succeed on a DC 13 Will save or become [[Frightened|frightened]] for 4 rounds. Creatures with 6 or more Hit Dice are unaffected. Pipes of haunting can be sounded twice a day.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], [[Scare (Spell)|scare]]

**Cost** 3,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 526
